channel.title: My expirment with RSBot.... ~A Blog and A Story~ By Lord UPDATED DAILY
channel.description:
So I have decided to mess around with RSBot a bit. I will record progress here.
[hr]
[b]Currently Training:[/b] Mining [b]Current Script:[/b] Lumbridge Western Swamp Miner
[b]Level: 56[/b]
[hr]
[b]Blog:[/b]
6/11/08
Having my tonsils out tommorow. I have run the scripts for a while with some flaws and a couple deaths. Got to lvl 52 in less than 24 hours.... about 450k profit. I am lvl 4 combat.
[IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u71/ffkoc/current-1.png[/img]
I am going to go to bed. The script will run all night mining coal. I wonder how it will turn out for day 2. After my tonsils, I will boot it up again. I will use from 10 PM EDT- 7 AM EDT
Night,
Lord
---------- [size=14pt][b][u]The Latest[/u][/b][/size] 6/12/08
My throat hurts like a bitch. Anyhow, the autoer stopped in the middle of the night. I am trying to figure out why. I was probably chased away by a random, or, most likely, got stuck in the Draynor bank. Why does this happen? Because it clicks the Deposit box, and can't figure out how to deposit from there. Anyhow, before I logged out, I mined 1,200 coal. I have a new tactic, since West Lumby coal is [b]very[/b] crowded during the day, I have started mining Iron using the Rimmington Any Miner during the day. I will post a new pic now.
[IMG]http://i165.photobucket.com/albums/u71/ffkoc/current-3.png[/img]\
-Lord
[hr]
[b]Number of troubles:[/b] 3 Deaths. GOLEMS!
1 Log Out
Got stuck in the book random event.

item.title: My expirment with RSBot.... ~A Blog and A Story~ By Lord UPDATED DAILY
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:39, topic:211808”][quote author=goatee link=topic=279000.msg2348164#msg2348164 date=1216829356]
Only like 1,085,831
[/quote]

More than that I’m sure.[/quote]
Chickens have 3HP, for each HP you kill you get 4 strength xp, so 3x4 = 12xp per chicken

13,000,000xp needed for 99, so 13,000,000 divided by 12 = 1,083,333

Read full topic

item.title: My expirment with RSBot.... ~A Blog and A Story~ By Lord UPDATED DAILY
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:39, topic:211808”][quote author=goatee link=topic=279000.msg2348164#msg2348164 date=1216829356]
Only like 1,085,831
[/quote]

More than that I’m sure.[/quote]

That’s using a zybez calculator actually.

nohope:

whats the recommended time for botting without getting banned anytime soon…? like 3-6 hours a time?

Well pretty much with rsbot it takes random breaks so that’s good. I would say like max 8 hours streak. And if you can try to monitor your bots so you can reply to people that might think you’re a bot.

Read full topic
item.source: My expirment with RSBot.... ~A Blog and A Story~ By Lord UPDATED DAILY

item.title: My expirment with RSBot.... ~A Blog and A Story~ By Lord UPDATED DAILY
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:39, topic:211808”][quote author=goatee link=topic=279000.msg2348164#msg2348164 date=1216829356]
Only like 1,085,831
[/quote]

More than that I’m sure.[/quote]

99 is 13m experience and chickens give 12 exp each (3 hp * 4 xp)

nohope:

whats the recommended time for botting without getting banned anytime soon…? like 3-6 hours a time?

I’ve used rsbot nearly constantly for about 8 hours a day for like a week straight. The bot has a timer random that makes the user log out every once in a while and sits idle to make it appear as if the player has left the computer to go eat or to do whatever else. You really don’t have to worry about being banned unless you use the bot excessively. Just run it as much as you think an average, no-life runescape player plays.

Read full topic
